title.rendered: Design New Jersey features Eldorado Stone Newest Products

content.rendered: Leading source for interior and architectural design news for New Jersey homeowners, Design New Jersey features Eldorado Stone’s Mezzaluna Artisan Fire Bowl and Sanderling Marquee Limestone profile in the June / July 2015 issue. Under “Style Section,” each product has a beautiful image that captures the essence of the finest stone veneer.
